listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 4.0-2 are included:

listitem.simpara: xserver-xorg-video-vmware (2013-7439) (38250)
The Univention Net Installer has been adapted to allow profile based installations of UCS-4.0-1 (35537).
The file name for temporary files created by UCR commit now start with a dot (.) to hide them by default (37819).
Fixed a race condition in the univention-ldapsearch wrapper, which prevented proper error detection (37631).
Fixed a compilation error in the memtest86+ binary which resulted in the memory test 7 Random number sequence to always fail (37638).
Support for the UCS Core Edition license has been added. Every Free for personal use license can easily be migrated to the UCS Core Edition. Details can be found in the 1324 (38107).
If a password has been changed via Samba 4, the account expiry setting was not always considered. This has been fixed (38060).
The LDAP attribute univentionSamba4pwdProperties (integer) has been added to the sambaDomain object class (28331).
The version of the Dojo Toolkit has been updated from 1.10.2 to 1.10.4. Support for IE11 in the Dojo module dojo/uacss has been added (38225).

If host name or user name are too long for the menu labels in the header, their length is now trimmed and ... is shown. The positioning of the back to overview header button has been adjusted. The UMC background image has been adjusted. The default search button has been adjusted to be smaller and to only contain an icon instead of text. The UMC header menus have been adjusted in their positioning on small screens and they have been styled with icons. The style of modules and module headers has been slightly adjusted. Pop-up dialogues that need no verification now have a close icon. Notifications must now be closed via a close icon. The label for module buttons is now centred if there is enough space (37780).
An error prevented the execution of stopping virtual machines as well as reporting erroneous UMC behaviour. These can now be executed again (37892).
Changed the cursor to a pointer when hovering grid row actions (37197).
A help icon has been added to the login dialogue (37804).
SVG icon images had under specific circumstances display problems in Internet Explorer 11. For Internet Explorer, the icons are displayed now in the PNG format (38225).
Displaying of the UMC reload dialogue has been adjusted (37565).
The automatic selection of the first item in a list widget (e.g., in the installed system locales in language settings) has been removed (33199).
Methods for resetting UMC modules and renewing a session have been added 37347).
Pass the required attribute to sub widgets of the ComplexInput widget (36539).
An animation has been added for opening and hiding modules (37899).
Update references to www.univention.de (37908).
The activation of UCS with a personalized license key as well as the import process of a new license file has been improved w.r.t. the usability (38132).
The UMC grid can now take care of cleaning up orphaned widget references that could lead to a growing memory consumption in the browser (particular in UVMM) (36615).
The Univention management console web server and the upload widgets can now handle uploading several files at once and are capable of drag and drop (38276).
Some label texts in the Services modules have been improved, and icons have been added for the module actions (36564).
The package python-notifier has been updated to version 0.9.7. This fixes a bug which could cause a UMC server crash in specific circumstances (37457).
A race condition during UMC session shutdown has been fixed, that could lead to a complete shutdown of the UMC server (37399).
Removing and subsequently adding extended attributes could lead to a UMC server crash. The attribute handling in the server has been improved (37447).
User preferences as well as favourite UMC modules could not be saved into the LDAP under specific circumstances. This behaviour has been adjusted (38222).
It is now possible to request a single-sign-on login token for localhost (37347).
The number of parallel and open request in the UMC webserver has been raised and can now be configured via the &ucsUCRV; umc/http/maxthreads (37851).
After installing an app, all pending join scripts are called with the credentials of the currently logged-in user (36822).
After installing apps or software packages, UMC modules are now reset, the UMC session is renewed automatically, and a page reload is done only if really necessary (37347).
Add support for WebInterfacePortHTTP and HTTPS in the ini file of an app (35456).
Update references to www.univention.de (37908).
Conflicts between apps are now calculated based on actual installation, not only one of the involved packages (35661).
The process of loading license information from the LDAP has been improved to avoid idle times in UMC (37616).
Apps may now define a minimal UCS version below which the app may not be installed (38042).
Apache may now be restarted by packages during installation via the Package Management module (38446).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: Support for the UCS Core Edition license has been added. Every "Free for personal use" license can easily be migrated to the UCS Core Edition. Details can be found in the 1324 (38103 and 38104).
Remove an attribute formerly used by Univention Net Installer from various computer modules (37560).
Fix tracebacks due to incorrect checks whether an object exists (37119).
Creating a simple authentication account is now much faster (37607).
Adjust an error message of the PrinterURI syntax class (36711).
Prevent de-installation of essential packages when creating a slave/master/member-server packages policy (36539).
Replaced the term General by a more descriptive title in various UDM modules (36401).
Improved error message format (37740).
Don't create a pointer record if no forward zone could be determined when modifying a computer object (37504).
Repair --policies option of UDM command line tool (21585).

Added appropriate validation for the mail domain name. To restore the old behaviour it is possible to overwrite the syntax from the CLI: ucr set directory/manager/web/modules/mail/domain/properties/name/syntax='string' (34552).
DVS and support information has been removed from univention-license-check (38203).
Two attributes domainPasswordComplex and domainPasswordStoreCleartext have been added to the sambadomain settings module (28331).
Labels of multi value fields in UDM modules have been adjusted to be more consistent (32760).
The appearance of the search and advanced search button has been adjusted. Shortened the description for the Back to search and Save changes buttons to Back and Save (37780).
The module cache is cleared now with the internal registration mechanism (37347).
A pop-up notification about automatically set default values was displayed for values which were disabled by the selected options. This has been fixed (37711).
Fix format of error message in specific circumstances (36711).
Execute UDM requests again if an LDAP error occurs due to timeout problems (37740).
Policy labels are now correctly displayed with an edit link. Changes on a UDM object can now be saved by pressing 'Return' on the keyboard (36708).
Update a warning icon (36460).
DVS and support information has been removed from the license information dialogue (38203).
When joining a system into a domain, the Kerberos password is no longer logged into /var/log/univention/join.log (37489).
Fix the calculation of the CIDR when displaying network interface settings (37326).
The positioning of page icons on small screens has been optimized (37824).
Additional connection and setup information is now shown by displaying the file motd.setup before the system is fully configured (37129, 38510).
Error handling during saving in the system setup modules has been improved (36843).
A warning is displayed during appliance mode when too few memory is available for installing UCS (36460).
The instructions how to access Univention Management Console for the first time has been enhanced (37804).
License agreement information can now be displayed during the setup wizard (37616).
The password description will now be hidden, as well, when the password field is hidden (e.g., during the installation) (38148).
The &ucsUCRV; system/setup/boot/fields/blacklist has been extended to disabling the selection of particular server roles (38116).

A reload of Apache is now disabled during the complete configuration of a UCS appliance. This has been done in order to avoid access problems at the end of the wizard when accessing UMC via HTTPS (37771).
The city search widget has been improved w.r.t. its usability (37771).
The progress bar has been adjusted to reach 100%, its localization has been corrected to match the chosen one, and its output has been improved (35550).
Output written into /var/log/univention/setup.log is now regularly flushed (38293).
Fixed wrong URL for advanced UVMM network setup (38314).
Cleanup scripts will now be executed if setup-join.sh is called from the command line. All output is logged to STDOUT/STDERR (38332).
The setup script 05_role/10role has been speeded up. It creates hard-links instead of copying packages into the dpkg cache (38393).
Improved logging when running setup-join: run-parts now prints filenames (38332).
Support for the UCS Core Edition license has been added. Every Free for personal use license can easily be migrated to the UCS Core Edition. Details can be found in the 1324 (38102).
Prevent an error if the user of an process is unknown (33923).
Killing multiple processes at once now works properly (33193).
If a process is being killed that is not running anymore an error message is shown (25305).
Hide the Back button during upgrading the system (37741).

The dialogue showing the list of packages to be updated/installed in the Software update module is now limited in its maximum height. The styling for the updater dialogue has been slightly adjusted (37573).
A default time-out of 10 minutes was added to the updater, after which stalled HTTP connections are aborted (36044).
A confirmation dialogue is now prompted when the browser window is closed or the page is reloaded during an update process (37033).
univention-add-app now prevents the installation of apps on the wrong server role (32543).
A local repository created from the UCS-4.0-1 DVD was incorrectly copied to the location reserved for UCS-4.0-0 (38248).
The Packages files required for profile based installations are now generated locally (35537).
If the first configured LDAP server was not reachable, timeouts could occur during the login. This has been fixed in the script univention-user-quota (36805).
An error message about an unbound variable has been removed from the script univention-group-quota (37134).

The quota settings are now written to a cache directory by a listener module. The PAM script which sets the quota settings to the share uses this cache directory. This improves the login performance (36989).
The width of the dialogue for editing &ucsUCRV; has been enlarged (37742).
HTML entities in &ucsUCRV; descriptions are now properly escaped (38036).
The rendering of the list view has been optimized (36569).
The update scripts have been adjusted to UCS 4.0-3 (38961).
If the first configured LDAP server was not reachable, timeouts could occur during the login. This has been fixed (36805).
The &ucsUCRV; descriptions for mail/localmailboxsizelimit and mail/messagesizelimit have been updated as 0 does not implement unlimited as previously mentioned (38061).

listitem.para:
Additional arguments for smtpd processes may now be added via &ucsUCRV;s. The given arguments are automatically added to the configuration file /etc/postfix/master.cf. The following UCR variable prefixes are currently supported:
mail/postfix/mastercf/options/smtp/... mail/postfix/mastercf/options/smtps/...
(37442)

listitem.simpara: The first changes to the main.cf framework have been done for defining a custom restriction rule set via &ucsUCRV;s for Postfix' smtps port (465). There is currently no change in Postfix behaviour (38049).
Allow Postfix to receive client mails on submission port 587 (30043).

Exclude RC4 Cipher Suites from all TLS security levels (7465). Adds &ucsUCRV;s mail/postfix/tls/client/exclude_ciphers and mail/postfix/smtpd/tls/exclude_ciphers and sets them by default to RC4, aNULL (38043).

Allow to set TLS/SSL settings for server and client. Disables SSLv3 for fresh installs, except for receiving mails. Adds &ucsUCRV;s mail/postfix/smtpd/tls/*protocols and mail/postfix/tls/client/*protocols (38044).

Add options to check the mapping of IP addresses to FQDNs to fight spam. Adds &ucsUCRV;s mail/postfix/smtpd/restrictions/sender/require_reverse_dns and mail/postfix/smtpd/restrictions/sender/require_forward-confirmed_reverse_dns for weaker and stricter reverse DNS checking respectively (38292).
Remove references to ahbl.org DNSBL, which has ceased operation (37471).
ClamAV has been updated to version 0.98.6 (36966).
univention-printquota now copies the /etc/machine.secret file for LDAP lookups in the join script (36861).
Fixed an endless loop when invalid values for certificates are supplied (38125).
The web-proxy Squid now also uses the additional LDAP servers configured through the &ucsUCRV; ldap/server/addition (37752).
Network interfaces other then ethX are now also added to the access control list (36623).
The Squid configuration can now be extended with custom ACLs via &ucsUCRV;s (37543).
Kill and restart the apache process in the init script if a reload crashes the apache process (37792).
The Apache web server did not close all inherited file descriptors by itself, which could lead to other processes being block indefinitely. This behaviour has been corrected (37952).

The UCS overview background image has been adjusted. The style of the UCS overview modules has been adjusted to match the style of the UMC. The display of the modules has been slightly adjusted (37780).

listitem.para:
The configuration of the SSL/TLS support in Apache has been improved:
If the new UCR variable apache2/ssl/tlsv11 is set to true, Apache only accepts TLS 1.1 and TLS 1.2.
If the new UCR variable apache2/ssl/tlsv12 is set to true, Apache only accepts TLS 1.2.
SSL compression disabled by default for security reasons, it can be enabled using the UCR variable apache2/ssl/compression.
Apache no longer accepts various insecure ciphers and hash algorithms (e.g. RC4, MD5 and the outdated export ciphers) by default. Note that such algorithms would not have been negotiated if the TLS client supports current crypto algorithms. A different set of ciphers can be configured using the new UCR variable apache2/ssl/ciphersuite.
If the new UCR variable apache2/ssl/honorcipherorder is set, the server choice of ciphers is used instead of the ciphers preferred by the TLS client.
Please refer to the &ucsUCRV; descriptions for additional details (35456).

listitem.simpara: Support for forcing a port in the URL shown in the ucs-overview page has been added. This is done by setting the &ucsUCRV; ucs/web/overview/entries/*/*/port_http and .../port_https (37566).
The setup to deny ssh logins on Domaincontrollers has been moved into the join scripts, as those restrictions were not applied in all cases (37971).
A memory leak caused by parsing XML documents has been fixed (36640).
Missing translation has been added (36567).

The error message has been made more understandable if the cloud end point returns an error due to a blocked account, incorrect server time or missing Amazon IAM policies to interact with EC2 (37099).
Some unused code has been removed (36635).
A display error of the icon for VNC access in Firefox has been corrected in the UMC module (36678).
An error in the grid of the UMC module resulted in an endless refreshing loop of the grid if no connection was available. This has been adjusted (38010).
Orphaned widget references in the UMC module that would lead to a growing memory consumption in the browser are now cleaned up (36615).
The Debian Installer does no longer set the &ucsUCRV; locale/keymap, which caused the join script to use en-us as default keyboard layout. This has been fixed (37551).
The container technology software docker.io is now available under UCS to pull and run Docker containers (37642).
The Windows Server 2008 R2 Foundation member server license check failed in Samba/AD domains (37687).
NetApp filer NAS devices joined to a Samba/AD DC failed to lookup SIDs due to an issue in negotiating strong encryption for server authentication (37874).
If the first configured LDAP server was not reachable, timeouts could occur during the share access on a member server. This has been fixed (36805).
This update fixes a traceback which occurred when Active Directory built-in accounts where positioned in an non-default location in the AD LDAP directory (37596).
The password expiry attributes are now set in OpenLDAP if the password has been changed in Active Directory/Samba 4 (36317).
Synchronisation of the domain password properties has been added (28331).
While synchronizing an object from Active Directory to UCS the UCS target object is now checked. If the UCS object should be ignored, the UCS object will not be modified or moved (37351).
Several packages have been added to the maintained package repository of UCS (36467).
The list of public SSL root certificates has been updated (37885).
An error in a network script terminated the DHCP script responsible for updating the network configuration too early, which lead to 3442 classless routes not being applied (37689).
Limit collection of files by univention-log-collector to the configured base path (36452).
If the first configured LDAP server was not reachable, timeouts could occur during the login. This has been fixed in univention-home-mounter (36805).
